id_argumento1: Over half the world’s population currently resides in cities, yet urban areas confront myriad complex challenges.
id_argumento2: With urbanization on the rise and nearly 70 per cent of the global population projected to reside in cities by 2050, the development of critical infrastructure, affordable housing, efficient transport systems and essential social services is imperative to create resilient and sustainable cities that meet the needs of all.

id_argumento1: Over half the world’s population currently resides in cities, yet urban areas confront myriad complex challenges.
